20101220182458.000|20101220182459.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20101220182459.000|20101220182459.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20101220182459.000|20101220182502.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20101220182502.000|20101220182502.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101220182502.000|20101220182505.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101220182505.000|20101220182505.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101220182505.000|20101220182508.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101220182508.000|20101220182509.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101220182509.000|20101220182511.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101220182511.000|20101220182511.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101220182511.000|20101220182513.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101220182513.000|20101220182513.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101220182513.000|20101220182516.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101220182516.000|20101220182516.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101220182516.000|20101220182518.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101220182518.000|20101220182519.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101220182519.000|20101220182519.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101220182519.000|20101220182521.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101220182521.000|20101220182521.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101220182521.000|20101220182524.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101220182524.000|20101220182524.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101220182524.000|20101220182527.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101220182527.000|20101220182527.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101220182527.000|20101220182529.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101220182529.000|20101220182529.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101220182529.000|20101220182531.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101220182531.000|20101220182531.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101220182531.000|20101220182532.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101220182532.000|20101220182534.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101220182534.000|20101220182534.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101220182534.000|20101220182536.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101220182536.000|20101220182536.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101220182536.000|20101220182538.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101220182538.000|20101220182539.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101220182539.000|20101220182539.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101220182539.000|20101220182542.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101220182542.000|20101220182542.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101220182542.000|20101220182544.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101220182544.000|20101220182544.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101220182544.000|20101220182546.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101220182546.000|20101220182548.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101220182548.000|20101220182548.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101220182548.000|20101220182550.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101220182550.000|20101220182550.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101220182550.000|20101220182552.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101220182552.000|20101220182552.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101220182552.000|20101220182554.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101220182554.000|20101220182554.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101220182554.000|20101220182556.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101220182556.000|20101220182556.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101220182556.000|20101220182559.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101220182559.000|20101220182559.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101220182559.000|20101220182601.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101220182601.000|20101220182603.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101220182603.000|20101220182604.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101220182604.000|20101220182604.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101220182604.000|20101220182607.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,
